1.0.name: wordpress/yapb-xmlrpc-sidebar-widget
1.0.description:
The YAPB XMLRPC Sidebar Widget displays either some of your latest images or some random images posted on a WordPress blog with YAPB.

To display your images, you have to have an active YAPB + YAPB XMLRPC Server installation on another blog.
